summary: Updated PRD with comprehensive changelog entry documenting all infrastructure setup work, Sentry integration, and automated error reporting system. Used Foam wikilinks for cross-references. Committed changes to dev branch, then merged and pushed to main branch. PRD version updated to 1.1.
